alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 21 at 5:52AM PDT until August 21 at 6:30AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM PDT THIS MORNING FOR NORTHWESTERN INYO, ESMERALDA AND NORTHWESTERN NYE COUNTIES... At 552 AM PDT, Heavy rain in the past 24 hours has led to widespread flooding in the area with local travel within Esmeralda...Nye...and eastern Inyo counties highly discouraged. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Lida, Dyer, Tonopah Test Range, Coaldale, Beatty, Gold Point, Lida Junction, Goldfield, Silver Peak, Scottys Junction, Scottys Castle, Mesquite Springs Campground, Fish Lake Valley Campground, Westgard Pass, Ancient Bristlecone Visitors Center, Grandview Campground and Boundary Peak. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
